title: Taboon
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Middle Eastern, Israeli
description: Vegetarian restaurant serving the classic Middle Eastern fare like falafel, hummus, salads, shakshuka, sabih, and pita pizza. The pita bread is made daily and can be serve with dips like babaghanoush, tahini, matbuha, or coriander cashew pesto. Located in the northern top of the village of Sri Thanu - coming from the 7-Eleven follow the road for 500 meters and find it on the right side in a green house with illuminated trees and a large patio.
